name: Defiler
description:
UPDATED 2018-05-04

Features: 

- New enemy type

- Boss fight

- Updated levels, 3 in total

- Support for Gamepad (recommended way to play)

- Short story introduction

- Improvements to animations, enemies, mechanics

- New music and ambience

- Improved UI

- - -

Defiler is a gore-soaked side-scroller action game, where the player takes the role of a dark champion on a journey to subjugate the barbarian tribes under his reign and ruthlessly slay anyone who dares to oppose him. 

 We appreciate every and any feedback concerning the game and gameplay. Please share with us any bugs  and glitches you might find.

Thank You for taking the time and trying out our game.

TIP!

Press ESC to open Pause Menu and view default controls.
